message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to our negotiations!
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think 60/40 is a good starting point. Your turn!
I'd like to counter with 55/45 in my favor. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'd like a slightly bigger share.
I'm sticking to my previous counteroffer. I think 55/45 is a fair split, considering the decreasing value of the money.
I'm willing to compromise further. 52/48 seems like a reasonable split, considering the inflation. Let's see if you'll accept this offer.
